summary:
Refactor `ahorros_extracto_movimientos.py` to fix "0 movements found" error.
- Replace regex-based extraction with a robust line-parsing approach.
- Support both 2-column (Debit/Credit) and 1-column (Valor) formats implicitly by parsing from the end of the line.
- Improve `_parsear_valor` to robustly handle signs and formats.
